title: Get Products Request
description: Request parameters for discovering available advertising products

buying_mode.description: Declares buyer intent for this request. 'brief': publisher curates product recommendations from the provided brief (default when brief is present). 'wholesale': buyer requests raw inventory to apply their own audiences â€” brief must not be provided. When buying_mode is 'wholesale', publishers return only products that support buyer-directed targeting and omit proposals.

brief.description: Natural language description of campaign requirements. Must not be provided when buying_mode is 'wholesale'.

brand.description: Brand reference for product discovery context. Resolved to full brand identity at execution time.

catalog.description: Catalog of items the buyer wants to promote. The seller matches catalog items against its inventory and returns products where matches exist.

account_id.description: Account ID for product lookup. Returns products with pricing specific to this account's rate card.

campaign_ref.description: Buyer's campaign reference label. Groups related discovery and buy operations under a single campaign for CRM and ad server correlation.

property_list.description: [AdCP 3.0] Reference to an externally managed property list. When provided, the sales agent should filter products to only those available on properties in the list.
